issue.title: [Rust] Reduce Rc/Refcell usage
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7560](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7560). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Reduce Rc/Refcell usage and move towards more idiomatic Rust code. Rc/Refcell is usually seen as an escape hatch from the borrow checker. There are other refinements that can be done later (such TypePtr, SchemeDescPtr).
